extendedIngredients.name: strip steak
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 new york strip steak, cooked then thinly sliced

recipes.title: Homemade Pizza with Steak, Arugula & Balsamic Reduction

winePairing.pairingText: Pizzan on the menu? Try pairing with Sangiovese, Barbera Wine, and Shiraz. The best wine for pizza depends on the toppings! Red sauce pizza will call for a red wine with some acidity, such as a barberan or sangiovese. Add pepperoni or sausage and you can go bolder with a syrah. The Ricasoli Brolio Chianti Classico Riserva with a 4 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 27 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Ricasoli Brolio Chianti Classico Riserva
productMatches.description: Intense ruby red color. Clear notes of strawberries, raspberries, spice and vanilla stand out on the nose. The wine is soft and enfolding on the palate; the right balance between acidity and tannins leaves a pleasant and persistent aftertaste in the mouth.Blend: 80% Sangiovese, 15% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Sauvignon.

recipes.instructions: Make your own homemade whole wheat pizza dough. {recipe here}Preheat oven to 350.In the meantime, heat a grill pan to medium high heat.Season 1 new york strip steak with salt & pepper on both sides, grill each side for 3-4 minutes. Remove from heat and let sit.Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface to desired size. Move pizza to baking sheet.On dough, evenly spread out olive oil, minced garlic, roasted red pepper, and crumbled goat cheese.Bake for 10-12 minutes.Remove from oven and top with thinly sliced new york strip steak and 1 cup of fresh arugula.Top with a homemade balsamic reduction drizzle. {recipe here}Cut and serve!

steps.step: Make your own homemade whole wheat pizza dough. {recipe here}Preheat oven to 350.In the meantime, heat a grill pan to medium high heat.Season 1 new york strip steak with salt & pepper on both sides, grill each side for 3-4 minutes.
Remove from heat and let sit.
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface to desired size. Move pizza to baking sheet.On dough, evenly spread out olive oil, minced garlic, roasted red pepper, and crumbled goat cheese.
Remove from oven and top with thinly sliced new york strip steak and 1 cup of fresh arugula.Top with a homemade balsamic reduction drizzle. {recipe here}
